notes: base lemma; can be mass or count noun
used for a cup of coffee
can refer to the beverage or the café

example_sentence_italian: Al bar hanno preparato molti caffè.
example_sentence_english: At the café they prepared many coffees.

example_sentence_italian: Ho assaggiato dei caffè diversi al festival.
example_sentence_english: I tasted some different coffees at the festival.
The aroma of the coffee is strong.

translation_english: to the café / to the coffee
notes: used also to mean 'to the café'
example_sentence_italian: Vado al caffè dopo il lavoro.
example_sentence_english: I go to the café after work.
Do you add sugar to the coffees?

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto la schiuma dal caffè.
example_sentence_english: I removed the foam from the coffee.

translation_english: from the cafés / from the coffees
example_sentence_italian: Ho ricevuto ordini dai caffè vicini.
example_sentence_english: I received orders from the nearby cafés.
I put sugar in the coffee.

example_sentence_italian: Nei caffè della piazza c'è sempre gente.
example_sentence_english: In the cafés of the square there are always people.
There is foam on the coffee.
They put toppings on the special coffees.
I have the cookie with the coffee.
They served pastries with the coffees.
